items.title: GM raises dividend and unveils $6 billion buyback program to cheer weary shareholders
items.description: Uncertainty about tariffs and labor-cost headwinds have weighed on stock this year

items.title: Eli Lilly cuts price of weight-loss drug Zepbound as competition heats up
items.description: The drug company is calling on insurers and federal programs to cover obesity as a chronic disease.

items.title: Investors love Buffett and then ignore what he says. How to avoid these mistakes made in 2024.
items.description: Larry Swedroe, author of several investing books, talks about the biggest mistakes investors make year after year, and how they can break the cycle.

items.title: Bonds are rising as stocks suffer February drop. But don’t count on long-term bonds as a cushion.
items.description: Bonds are up so far in February, outperforming U.S. stocks ahead of upcoming inflation data.

items.title: Lowe’s stock jumps as same-store sales rise for first time in 2 years
items.description: Lowe’s reported quarterly results that beat expectations but gave a downbeat full-year outlook a day after rival Home Depot did the same.
